Boots.description:
+25 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 35%.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Mercury's Treads
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and reduces duration of disabling effects
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +25 Magic Resist UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 35%. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Boots.description:
UNIQUE Passive: +15% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''
Boots.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and Cooldown Reduction
Boots.sanitizedDescription: UNIQUE Passive: +15% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.) ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''

Boots.description:
+25 Armor

UNIQUE Passive: Blocks 10% of the damage from basic attacks.
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Ninja Tabi
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and reduces incoming basic attack damage
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +25 Armor UNIQUE Passive: Blocks 10% of the damage from basic attacks. UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+400 Health
+60 Magic Resist
+150% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Increases all healing received by 20%.
Endgame Items.name: Spirit Visage
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +400 Health +60 Magic Resist +150% Base Health Regen +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive: Increases all healing received by 20%.

Endgame Items.description:
+90 Armor
+20% Cooldown Reduction
+400 Mana

UNIQUE Aura: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 15%.
Endgame Items.name: Frozen Heart
Endgame Items.plaintext: Massively increases Armor and slows enemy basic attacks
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +90 Armor +20% Cooldown Reduction +400 Mana UNIQUE Aura: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 15%.

Endgame Items.description:
+25 Attack Damage
+1000 Mana
+25% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants bonus Attack Damage equal to 2% of maximum Mana.
UNIQUE Toggle: Single target spells and attacks (on hit) consume 3% of current Mana to deal bonus physical damage equal to twice the amount of Mana consumed.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Muramana
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +25 Attack Damage +1000 Mana +25% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants bonus Attack Damage equal to 2% of maximum Mana. UNIQUE Toggle: Single target spells and attacks (on hit) consume 3% of current Mana to deal bonus physical damage equal to twice the amount of Mana consumed. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+30 Attack Damage
+30 Ability Power
+30% Attack Speed
+10% Critical Strike Chance
+8% Movement Speed
+250 Health
+200 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Basic attacks grant 20 Movement Speed for 2 seconds. Kills grant 60 Movement Speed instead. This Movement Speed bonus is halved for ranged champions.
UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack deals bonus physical damage equal to 200% of base Attack Damage on hit (1.5 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Trinity Force
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +30 Attack Damage +30 Ability Power +30% Attack Speed +10% Critical Strike Chance +8% Movement Speed +250 Health +200 Mana UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Basic attacks grant 20 Movement Speed for 2 seconds. Kills grant 60 Movement Speed instead. This Movement Speed bonus is halved for ranged champions. UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack deals bonus physical damage equal to 200% of base Attack Damage on hit (1.5 second cooldown). (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+60 Armor
+30 Ability Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+500 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack (on hit) deals bonus physical damage equal to 125% of base Attack Damage to enemies near the target, and creates a field around the target for 2 seconds that slows enemy Movement Speed by 30% (1.5 second cooldown, half-sized field if ranged).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Iceborn Gauntlet
Endgame Items.plaintext: Basic attacks create a slow field after spell cast
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +60 Armor +30 Ability Power +10% Cooldown Reduction +500 Mana UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack (on hit) deals bonus physical damage equal to 125% of base Attack Damage to enemies near the target, and creates a field around the target for 2 seconds that slows enemy Movement Speed by 30% (1.5 second cooldown, half-sized field if ranged). (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+400 Health
+40 Attack Damage
+20% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion Cleaves them, reducing their Armor by 5% for 6 seconds (stacks up to 6 times, up to 30%).
UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Dealing physical damage grants 20 movement speed for 2 seconds. Assists on Cleaved enemy champions or kills on any unit grant 60 movement speed for 2 seconds instead. This Movement Speed is halved for ranged champions.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: The Black Cleaver
Endgame Items.plaintext: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions reduces their Armor
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +400 Health +40 Attack Damage +20% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion Cleaves them, reducing their Armor by 5% for 6 seconds (stacks up to 6 times, up to 30%). UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Dealing physical damage grants 20 movement speed for 2 seconds. Assists on Cleaved enemy champions or kills on any unit grant 60 movement speed for 2 seconds instead. This Movement Speed is halved for ranged champions. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+100 Armor

UNIQUE Passive: Upon being hit by a basic attack, reflects magic damage back to the attacker equal to 25% of your bonus Armor plus 15% of the incoming damage.

(Bonus Armor is Armor from Items, Buffs, Runes and Masteries.)
(Reflect damage is calculated based on damage taken before being reduced by Armor.)
Endgame Items.name: Thornmail
Endgame Items.plaintext: Returns damage taken from basic attacks as magic damage
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +100 Armor UNIQUE Passive: Upon being hit by a basic attack, reflects magic damage back to the attacker equal to 25% of your bonus Armor plus 15% of the incoming damage. (Bonus Armor is Armor from Items, Buffs, Runes and Masteries.) (Reflect damage is calculated based on damage taken before being reduced by Armor.)

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown).

At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds.

Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player.

(Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).
Starting Items.name: Warding Totem (Trinket)
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Trinket. Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown). At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds. Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. (Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).
